title: Real Results, Real Users
description: See how others are using Clipposaurus to share content securely.

testimonials.title: Developer Teams
testimonials.quote: We use Clipposaurus to share API keys and credentials securely during development. The time-limited sharing is perfect for our workflow.

testimonials.title: Remote Workers
testimonials.quote: Being able to share confidential documents without worrying about them being accessible forever gives us peace of mind.

testimonials.title: Content Creators
testimonials.quote: I share preview links with clients that automatically expire. It's simple and they don't need to create an account.
